For those visiting Malacca one of the best
free things you can possibly do is take a

Malacca gets really hot during the day so
we've decided to get up early.

It is only eight in the morning and we're
going to do some exploring along the river.

If you continue walking upstream you will
come to an area that is just covered in graffiti

Along the river there is a lot of new development
but there are still some traditional homes
